3.7.19  9:54 am   Just want to say I really appreciate you sharing some "favorite" moments (or at least moments you like for certain songs/artists.) For me, it feels awesome to get turned on to new songs or moments in songs I might have missed especially by people I respect. Wanna hit me with a Huey Lewis moment that strikes you? Thanks and have a great day.
